Name: Charades Movie One
About the game: Solve movie charades, guess which pictures represent which movie names The game shows the name of the movie, you need to choose which pictures represent the name of this movie and click on them. If you answer correctly, you get points. If the wrong one you lose. Collect as many points as possible by hitting the leaderboard table. And also get achievements.
